This allows you to search over:

• Owner Name

invitations.orgPrompt: Like to sign up your organization?
invitations.missingTokenPrompt: Please check the link and try again
invitations.orgInviteTitle: You have been invited to create an organization!

org.noteLogUrl: Note: For optimal quality use a square image
org.makePrivateDescription:
When a new project is created, it will be defaulted to Public.
      (Private projects cannot be viewed by anyone outside of your organization)
org.productSelectTitle: Select all the products you would like to make available to your organization
org.storeSelectTitle: Select all the stores you would like to make available to your organization

products.definition: Useful files that result from a series of steps.

profile.title: Profile
profile.optOutOfEmailOption: I want to receive email notifications

visibility.visible: My profile information is publicly viewable
visibility.restricted: My profile information is restricted from the public

errors.notAuthorized: You must login. This could be due to a prior login expiring.
errors.notFoundDescription: Something went wrong and the page or resource could not be found!
errors.groupRequired: You must be a member of at least one group.
errors.userForbidden: An error occurred: Forbidden. Please contact your organization administrator.
errors.friendlyForbidden: You are not allowed to do that. Please contact your organization administrator
errors.forbiddenForAllOrgs: You are not allowed to do that. Please select an organization
errors.notAMemberOfOrg: You are not a member of that organization
errors.orgMembershipRequiredText:
In order to use Scriptoria, you must be a member of at least one organization.

Please contact your organization administrator to discuss receiving an invite to an organization on Scriptoria.
errors.orgMustBeSelected: An organization must be selected to view this page
errors.verifyEmailDescription:
In order to use Scriptoria, we need you to verify your email address.

Please log into your email and clik the verification link.

tasks.title: My Tasks
tasks.noTasksTitle: No tasks are assigned to you.
tasks.noTasksDescription: Tasks that require your attention will appear here.

project.title: Project
project.noAvailableGroups: There are no available groups for the selected organization
project.visibilityDescription: If you make your project Private, it will not be visible in the directory or accessible by other organizations

products.title: Products
products.empty: You have no products for this project.
products.creationInProgress: Pending: You cannot add a product until the project setup has been completed.

automaticRebuild.title: Automatic Rebuilds
automaticRebuild.description: When automatic rebuilds are on, Scriptoria will automatically rebuild your products when the input source is updated

organizationDownloads.title: Allow Other Organizations to download
organizationDownloads.description: When this setting is on, any Scriptoria User this is able to view your project in the Directory will be able to download your Products' Files

visibility.title: Public Visibility
visibility.description: Public Projects allow any Scriptoria User to view your project in the Directory

archive.error: There was an error trying to archive the project

automaticBuilds.error: Error: We could not change automatic build status

users.noneFound: No users matching the selected criteria were found.
users.title: Manage Users

addUser.error: No user was found with that email address. Please ask them to create an account.

lock.success: User is locked. A locked user will not be able to log in to Scriptoria.
lock.error: There was an error locking the user

unlock.success: User is active. The user will now be able to log in to Scriptoria.
unlock.error: there was an error activating the user
